SEARCH
Package com.internship.system.model

Class Application

java.lang.Object
com.internship.system.model.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents a student's application for an internship position.

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(int applicationId, String studentId, int internshipId, ApplicationStatus status)
      Constructs a new Application with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - unique identifier for this application
      studentId - ID of the student submitting the application
      internshipId - ID of the internship being applied to
      status - initial status of the application

    • Application

      public Application(int applicationId, String studentId, int internshipId, ApplicationStatus status, boolean withdrawalRequested)
      Constructs a new Application with all parameters including withdrawal status.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - unique identifier for this application
      studentId - ID of the student submitting the application
      internshipId - ID of the internship being applied to
      status - initial status of the application
      withdrawalRequested - whether a withdrawal has been requested
